Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the period during which the city of White Plains is authorized to impose an additional sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Extends the period during which the city of White Plains is authorized to impose an additional sales and compensating use tax to 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the period during which the city of White Plains is authorized to impose an additional sales and compensating use tax
